Question
========

Marleen investigates the effect of the degree of sensitivity of mothers on the ability or inability to delay reward in four-year-old children. In doing so, she wants to statistically control for mothers' level of education (high, medium, low). Which analysis technique is suitable for this? 
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple logistic regression
* Multiple linear regression
* Two-way ANOVA
* ANCOVA

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
